long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension Description:

Turn your website interactions into automated end-to-end tests effortlessly with our AI-powered Chrome Extension!

This extension makes creating automated tests as simple as clicking a button. Whether you’re testing a website's functionality or optimizing user experience, this tool records your actions (clicks, key entries, and more) and instantly converts them into a ready-to-use test script.

Key Features:
Easy to Use: Start recording with a single click. No complex setup required—perfect for developers, testers, or anyone managing a website.
AI-Powered Self-Healing: Websites change, but your tests don’t have to break. Our AI automatically adapts to webpage updates, ensuring your tests remain functional, even when elements are modified.
Complete Control: You’re in charge! Data is only collected when you click “Start” and is only sent to our backend when you explicitly click “Send.” Your privacy and control are our top priorities.

Sign up for an account at tessanaAI.com to unlock the full power of this extension and begin automating your tests today!

Boost your productivity and eliminate repetitive tasks with this intuitive extension, and let us handle the automation!
